name: Hair Golem
description: A small construct made of hair, notable for its speed and specialized abilities.
memorable: Immunity to spells that would alter its form makes it a strong guardian.
goals: Typically serves as a guardian or minion, defending its creator.
relations: May serve or be created by spellcasters or other constructs.
environment: Often found in the service of a creator, potentially in magical locations.
strengths: Highly resistant to certain damage types and immune to several conditions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to slashing damage, indicating a significant weakness.
attacks: Can perform a Lash attack that deals slashing damage and may knock enemies prone.
most_powerful_ability: Immutable Form renders it immune to any spell or effect that would change its form.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, aiding in low-light scenarios.
additional_information: Fast and agile with a high Dexterity score.
Limited intelligence and charm, making it ineffective outside combat.
Can resist bludgeoning and piercing damage from non-magical attacks.
Immunities include charm, exhaustion, fear, paralysis, petrification, and poison.
Best suited for low-level encounters as a minion.
test_queries: hair creature guardian with unique abilities
small agile construct that resists conditions
low-level golem with high Dexterity score
